item.description:
This is a great time for shrooming. I typically go looking for tree mushrooms and drive the roads looking for dead or dying trees around Columbus Day for about two weeks. I love trekking through the woods looking at nature but don't dare eat many of the ground shrooms.

Who would like to go for a ride or a walk (maybe both)? Let's talk via email about where to go. We can meet at a state forest or park and walk through the woods or drive the back roads of MA, NH & ME...I'm up for anything. Rick

P.S. Bradley Palmer State Forest in Topsfield. http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.name: Lets go pick'n!
